PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-06132022-06-02,  NRCAN,  ,  ,  , 
ActExplosives Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Explosives Regulations, 2013 (Restricted Components)
PrecisRegulations Amending the EXPLOSIVES REGULATIONS, 2013 (RESTRICTED COMPONENTS) in order to (1) change the structure of Part 20 of the regulation to create a three-tiered layout; (2) update the list of restricted components to include calcium ammonium nitrate (CAN), hexamine, aluminum powder and acetone; (3) add ammonium nitrate and calcium ammonium nitrate contained in cold packs as Tier 3 restricted components; (4) use Chemical Abstracts Service Registry Numbers and concentration limits to define restricted components; and (5) make administrative changes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0121 Publication Date: 2022-06-22
AttachmentsAttachment
